Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Eric Anthony
Dear Sir,
Eric Anthony shouldn't play at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .208 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
